fulltext:
PERSONAL INFORMATION
Date of birth:  12/05/1985.                 Gender:  Male.                Marital status: Married.

EDUCATION
2004 - 2011:
+ Tin học xây dựng - University of Civil Engineering.
2013 - 2015:
+ Hà Nội Aptech. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
July 2018 - Now: Technical lead
+ Company: X-Ideas Vietnam (xideas.vn)
+ Develop React Native app “Xwork - Mạng xã hội việc làm”.
+ Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vn.xideas.xwork&hl=en_US
+ Ios: https://apps.apple.com/vn/app/xwork-mxh-việc-làm/id1458069557?l=vi
March 2018 - July 2018: Main responsibilities
+ Company: Logivan Technologies (https://www.logivan.com)
+ Develop React Native app “LOGIVAN- Chủ hàng”.
+ Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.logivan.shipper
+ Ios: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/logivan-chủ-hàng/id1386678770 
May 2017 - September 2017: Free Job
+ Create some React Native apps with my ideas.
+ Android 1: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Hoc-Mien-Phi
+ Android 2: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=OHLALA+STUDIO
+ Ios: https://apps.apple.com/vn/developer/luu-minh/id1438594214?l=vi
July 2016 - May 2017: Main responsibilities
+ Company: Abivin (https://www.abivin.com)
+ Develop React Native app “Abivin vRoute”.
+ Android: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=abivin
+ Ios: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/abivin-vroute-v3-0/id1314836746
November 2015 - March 2016:  
+ Company: NTQ solution. 
   Lưu Văn Minh
JOB: REACT NATIVE
TECHNICAL SKILLS
+ 3+ years working with React Native/ReactJS.
+ Optimize Performance React Native App.
+ Good skill with redux and redux ecosystem (redux-saga, reselect, redux-persist, 
redux-thunk, redux-form,...).
+ Familiar with native build tools for using with React Native project, for    
example Xcode and Gradle.
+ Knowledge Native Module for Android and Ios.
+ Familiar with JavaScript ES6.
+ Familiar with Git Source code control. 
OTHER SKILLS
+ Good study and research skill, learn/use new technology
+ Good communication skill, confident and friendly with project team member.
+ High responsibility in working.
       Thank you !

educations.major: Kỹ thuật xây dựng công trình thủy
